item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am Vibhas Goyal. Curretnly working as Senior Member of Technical Staff at Oracle. Working on the Oracle Analytics team. I studied from B.Tech (2014 - 2018) in Engineering Science and Computer Science from IIT Hyderabad. This is the about page and for me, this page can be considered as one of the most difficult page to write because it involves writing about my objective self. I wish to become an entrepreneur and start my own profitable and scalable business.

item.title: Contact
Tweets
item.description: Interestingly enough people who don’t have touch typing skills use passwords that are suited to type with just one finger. Keep your ears free. No music. No videos. No podcasts.Try it. Will this finally make me insane. A great productivity hack. Pause before you click on anything. Be mindful of what you are reading

item.title: LeetCode 1658
item.description: A simple problem on the first approach that I have to look at. Let’s see this as two pointers. One starting from the index 0 and the other index will start from len-1. int begin = 0 ; int end = len - 1; If there is no solution we return -1 return -1; This will track the number of edits int count = 0; The first step is to check if arr[begin] is less than arr[end],

item.title: NVIM
item.description: Nvim is the best editor so far. But we have to configure it. Otherwise, it’s just a text editor. The one down side I found is that it cannot be used very effectively over ssh. Usually the VM’s are not configured like the way nvim is done locally. So not a good idea to use it? Nah, still it is so smooth and fast to use it as if this is the only thing that has made editing my files as fast as my thoughts.

item.title: Keychron K8 Pro
item.description: Why a new keyboard? I brought this keyboard because I have been looking forward to owning a proper mechanical keyboard again for some time now. The last proper keyboard I had was the ErgoDox EZ. It was a good keyboard. But this is even better I think. QMK / VIA configuration. This was a bit confusing at first. It still is but I have made some changes to suit my needs.

item.title: Welcome To My Blog
item.description: This is the start of my journey on my way to blog. I am not a professional blogger in any way right now. Yes, I have started blogs in the past but right now, I am finally feeling as if I am speaking to the public to express my thoughts. I think a lot. I think this will be a good outlet for me. I have setup auto publish using git and hosted this on github.

Make the center footer wide.. Change the logo text.. Update the about page.. Make a portfolio on the front page Upload some photos Add referral links for linode , digital ocean ? , cred , paytm ? , amazon..! seo optimizations and website added to google fetch previous content and reupload it here…
